alert.note: Alert for Camden; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN... SOUTHEASTERN PASQUOTANK...SOUTHEASTERN PERQUIMANS AND SOUTHEASTERN CURRITUCK COUNTIES... At 216 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Snug Harbor, or 10 miles southeast of Hertford, moving northeast at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail are possible with this storm. This storm will be near... Nixonton around 230 PM EDT. Weeksville around 235 PM EDT. Old Trap, Shiloh and Whitehall Shores around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bob White Fork, Holiday Island, Stevenson Point, Symonds Creek, Listers Corner, Glen Cove, Jacocks, Frog Island, Riddle and Texas. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
